## Player.isDvrInUse() method

Indicates whether DVR is in use.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isDvrInUse(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

DVR mode, if it is enabled, is triggered we a user seeks behind the live edge.
